Description: The process of extracting features from a source in a given context and putting them isolated in a new context; or a intrinsically isolated set of features.

The process of breaking things down into parts. Reformulating or recognizing a whole as a collection of constituents. Contrary to composition, which is the process of gluing things up into one, reformulating or recognizing a collection of constituents as whole.
A finite collection of unambiguous steps.
A quantized information. Information made up by a finite set of discrete units, what allows it to be transmitted and operated by Computers.
The process of granting autonomy. Decreasing dependency of your guidance.
The process of defining or recognizing values through a detailed examination.
